p: In a study published in the journal Trends in Food Science and Technology, Zhong et al. (2020), reports the current advances in research on the structural, functional and chemical characteristics of Enteromorpha polysaccharides. The algae of the genus Enteromorpha produce several types of polysaccharides with relevant biological activities. However, the relationship between structure and function of polysaccharides is not yet fully elucidated. A peculiar characteristic of sulfated polysaccharides is that they have lower molecular weights and exhibited excellent immuno-relevant and antioxidant activities.
